text: Love the mood of this track. I haven't played this game, but the music certainly makes me want to. I only played the Walking Dead games from Telltale which I really liked, but they released so many other series now in the same vein that I kind of got lost. I was disappointed to see that C418 didn't compose for this game, but it certainly seems like it turned out well under Anadel.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky It was a pretty good game. If you like experiencing the story of games, I’d recommend it since it’s a fun ride. It doesn’t have as much gameplay integrated in as the Walking Dead or other Telltale games, but the Minecraft charm was what really did it for me. This track was definitely a very fitting one for the setting it took place in.
author: GenericYoutubeComment Channel

text: I have not played that one either. But Telltale's Batman was amazing with pretty good music in it.
author: Camil Aven

text: I’d love to see more tracks from this game in the future. The music was a very memorable part of the game for me.
author: GenericYoutubeComment Channel

text: From what I've seen of my cousins playing it, it seems like a pretty fun game.
author: War J.

text: I wonder if it's any fun.
author: Andres T
